name: Time Blitz
description:
My goal for this game was to make enemies feel good to kill >:)

Didn't have enough time to add sound but I still think it's a little bit fun to kill enemies.

Sometimes the camera shake can be a bit much so you can toggle that.

WASD to move.

Click to shoot!

There's a timer in the middle of the map. If it hits 0 you die. If an enemy hit you, you lose time. If you kill an enemy, you gain time.

Live as long as possible!
